00006 ErrMatStatGauss::ErrMatStatGauss() {
00007   for (int c = 0; c < NCHARGES; ++c) {
00008     _rhoErrNSpreads[c] = 0.;
00009     _thetaErrNSpreads[c] = 0;
00010   }
00011 }

00031 void ErrMatStatGauss::init(const Poly3 & rhoErr,
00032                            const Poly3 & thetaErr,
00033                            const Poly3 & rhoErrSpread,
00034                            const Poly3 & thetaErrSpread,
00035                            const Poly3 & rhoPullSigma,
00036                            const Poly3 & thetaPullSigma,
00037                            double rhoErrNSpreads[NCHARGES],
00038                            double thetaErrNSpreads[NCHARGES]) {
00039   _rhoErr = rhoErr;
00040   _thetaErr = thetaErr;
00041   _rhoErrSpread = rhoErrSpread;
00042   _thetaErrSpread = thetaErrSpread;
00043   _rhoPullSigma = rhoPullSigma;
00044   _thetaPullSigma = thetaPullSigma;
00045 
00046   for (int c = 0; c < NCHARGES; ++c) {
00047     _rhoErrNSpreads[c] = rhoErrNSpreads[c];
00048     _thetaErrNSpreads[c] = thetaErrNSpreads[c];
00049   }

00053   
00054 TMatrixD ErrMatStatGauss::matrix(double rM, double tM, double rP, double tP) 
00055   const {
00056   // The algorithm is as follows: For a given true rho, find the average
00057   // rho and theta errors and the spreads in the rho and theta error 
00058   // distributions. The final error is the average error plus the spread
00059   // times nSpreads:
00060 
00061   TMatrixD result(4,4);
00062 
00063   double errRhoN = _rhoPullSigma.getVal(rM) * measuredErrRho(rM,MINUS);
00064   double thetaRhoN = _thetaPullSigma.getVal(rM) * measuredErrTheta(rM,MINUS);  
00065   double errRhoP = _rhoPullSigma.getVal(rP) * measuredErrRho(rP,PLUS);
00066   double thetaRhoP = _thetaPullSigma.getVal(rP) * measuredErrTheta(rP,PLUS);
00067 
00068   result[0][0] = errRhoN * errRhoN;
00069   result[1][1] = thetaRhoN * thetaRhoN;
00070   result[2][2] = errRhoP * errRhoP;
00071   result[3][3] = thetaRhoP * thetaRhoP;
00072 
00073   return result;
00074 }
00075 
00076 
00077 double ErrMatStatGauss::measuredErrRho(double rho, Charge c) const {
00078   return 
00079     _rhoErr.getVal(rho) + _rhoErrSpread.getVal(rho) *_rhoErrNSpreads[c];
00080 }
00081 
00082 
00083 double ErrMatStatGauss::measuredErrTheta(double rho, Charge c) const {
00084   return 
00085     _thetaErr.getVal(rho) + _thetaErrSpread.getVal(rho) *_thetaErrNSpreads[c];
00086 }
